title: Organizations (Orgs)
description: This document describes the fields in the orgs.json file.

orgShort.description: A short name for the organization.  Counties should be the county name.  Legislative districts should be the LD number, zero-padded if a single digit (ex: 03rd)

orgType.description: A descriptor of the organization type.  Expected values are: "County", "LD", "State Young", "County Young", "College Young", "HS Young", "Caucus", and "CD" (Congressional District).  Concatenation of orgShort & orgType & "Democrats" (or "Dems") should yield a reasonable but sometimes imperfect organization full name.

orgFull.description: Full name of the organization (ex: "1st Legislative District Democrats" or "King County Democratic Central Committee")

orgWeb.description: URL to the organization's public-facing website

orgFbPage.description: URL to the organization's Facebook page

orgFbGroup.description: URL to the organization's Facebook group

orgTwAlias.description: Twitter alias used by the organization (ex: "43rdDems" from https://twitter.com/43rdDems)

orgOfficers.description: URL to the organization's list of officers

orgEvents.description: URL to the organization's events calendar

orgRecurring.description: Day of the organization's recurring meeting (ex: "1st Mon" or "3rd Tue")

orgPCOs.description: URL to the organization's list of PCOs

orgBylaws.description: URL to the organization's governing documents such as a charter, bylaws, or standing rules

orgBylawsArchive.description: URL to an archived copy of the organization's governing documents

orgEndorsements2016.description: URL to an archived copy of the organization's governing documents
